name: AIStore Recharge
author: susheelhbti

sections.description:
In order to use this recharge plugin you need to install two following plugins

1 Woocommerce
2 WooCommerce Wallet – credit, cashback, refund system (https://wordpress.org/plugins/woo-wallet/)

If you are running e-commerce protal , coupon portal , blog etc you can start making more money by offering recharges from your portal.

You can earn upto 6.5 % profit [margin keep changing ] from the margin in the recharge. The setup is very easy.

Take Rs 10,000 balance and get free call back processing plugin

In order to use this services you need to be a registered user of http://api.sakshamapp.com/ and in configuration you will need to provide username and password.

Create 4 Pages
Page 1 for prepaid recharge form and insert this shortcode [ AISTORERECHARGEFORM type=”prepaid” ] Remove spaces
Page 2 for postpaid recharge form and insert this shortcode [ AISTORERECHARGEFORM type=”postpaid” ] Remove spaces
Page 3 for DTH recharge form and insert this shortcode [ AISTORERECHARGEFORM type=”dth” ] Remove spaces
Page 4 for report of recharge and insert this shortcode [ AistoreRechargeReport ] Remove spaces

Key Features

*It provide Prepaid recharge , Post paid recharge , DTH recharge.
* It provide complete recharge report for admin and user.

Usage

  1. Download and extract to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. “Dashboard”->”Recharge”
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. “Dashboard”->”Recharge”

short_description: AIStore Recharge Plugins using this you can provide recharge services from your website and you can make profit from this.
